snippet: Wall Street notched its fifth consecutive decline on Tuesday fueled by concerns over the euro zone.
abstract: Stock market sinks deeper for a fifth straight day, eroding the first quarter's gains and ending with the worst day for Wall Street this year; major indexes were down 1.7 percent, a decline fueled in large part by concerns over the euro zone.

byline.contributor: David Jolly and Mark Scott contributed reporting.Mark Scott contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Wall Street notched its fifth consecutive decline on Tuesday fueled by concerns over the euro zone.

headline.seo: Wall Street Follows Europe Down Sharply
headline.main: Worst Loss This Year for Wall St.
headline.print_headline: Worst Loss This Year For Wall St.
